snippet: Prof. Joseph Wilson of Brooklyn College’s Graduate Center for Worker Education “unjustly enriched” himself, a City University investigation charged.
abstract: City University of New York Prof Joseph Wilson, longtime director of Brooklyn College's Graduate Center, is suspended following internal investigation reveals he had helped himself to at least $200,000 in salary that he was not entitled to; he had also misappropriated grant money, and been reimbursed for travel expenses he had not incurred; state attorney general's office is investigating but no charges have been filed.
lead_paragraph: Prof. Joseph Wilson of Brooklyn College’s Graduate Center for Worker Education “unjustly enriched” himself, a City University investigation charged.

headline.main: CUNY Hopes to Dismiss Brooklyn College Official Over Financial Inquiry
headline.print_headline: CUNY Hopes to Dismiss Graduate Center Official Over Financial Inquiry

keywords.value: Brooklyn College, City University of New York
keywords.name: organizations
